name: Kirby and his dream friends establish communism
name_original: Kirby and his dream friends establish communism
description:
Rated A for cringe, dankness, fapachino (this isn't accurately rated by the ESRB or at all for that matter) ...

Play as Kirby the faint pink hero as he collects communist for no particular reason (maybe he hates the stock market?). Crash society and break your allowance!

This is very shitty, I'm fully aware.
